entry.source: A demon residing in {F804,5}Kanda Shrine,{F804,0} to the{F801}{F804,5}far north{F804,0} of Kasumigaseki, has begun attacking{F801}humans and causing problems. It used to be a{F801}god that protected people, but now they live{F801}in fear of it. I will give whoever defeats{F801}{F873,1} a fine reward.{F801}
